A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The high critical acclaim for this garbage of a film that ruined everything that is Star Wars is suspect. Disney is arguably the most powerful entertainment corporation in the world\, and it makes me wonder if they have these critics on a leash... Look at the AUDIENCE score\, and tell me what is more accurate - the actual consumers of the business product or critics that have strong connections with PR/Marketing divisions of companies? Anyways\, this movie\, along with the suspect high acclaims\, fake marketing\, and the obvious politicizing of hard left wing ideologies ended my interest and love for the Star Wars franchise.
